channel.title: Adding ::jail
channel.description:
I need a ::jail command that will teleblock the person, and will put them in certain coords.
If you have, please tell me.
REWARD

item.title: Adding ::jail
item.dc:creator: @Goodoo_dolls Goodoo dolls
item.description:
@Goodoo_dolls wrote:

dont you have to declare this?? in public boolean??

Read full topic

item.title: Adding ::jail
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

if (command.startsWith("jail") && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 2) { try { String name = command.substring(5); client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)]; c.teleportToX = 2604; c.teleportToY = 3105; c.teleBlockTimer = 700;//Place your teleblock variable or boolean here.. c.sendMessage("You've been thrown in jail for breaking the rules."); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Enter the name of the player you want to jail."); } }

Try that

Read full topic

item.title: Adding ::jail
item.dc:creator: @Runer_King Runer King
item.description:
@Runer_King wrote:

Client.java:3256: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable saveme
location: class client
saveme = false; ^

#################First one above, second below#############################################
Client.java:3256: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable
found : value
Teleblock() = true
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 26, 2007, 08:52:22 PM[/size][hr][quote="`Rich, post:10, topic:168076"][quote author=zezimaisme111 link=topic=227577.msg1955565#msg1955565 date=1198741706]
try

else if (command.startsWith("jail") && (playerRights >= 3)) { try { String otherPName = command.substring(10); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); if(otherPIndex != -1) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; p.teleportToX = 3230; p.teleportToY = 3407; p.heightLevel = 0; saveme = false; teleblock() = ture; p.updateRequired = true; // PlayerHandler.messageToAdmins = "Jailed "+p.playerName+" by " +playerName+"; p.sendMessage("Jailed by "+playerName); } else { sendMessage("The name doesnt exist."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Try entering a name you want to jail.."); } } else if (absY >= 3230 && absY <= 3407) { sendMessage("You cannot teleport when your in jail!!!"); }
[/quote]

You spelled true wrong.[/quote]

I saw that error right away.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding ::jail

else if (command.startsWith("jail") && (playerRights >= 3)) { try { String otherPName = command.substring(10); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); if(otherPIndex != -1) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; p.teleportToX = 3230; p.teleportToY = 3407; p.heightLevel = 0; saveme = false; teleblock() = true; p.updateRequired = true; // PlayerHandler.messageToAdmins = "Jailed "+p.playerName+" by " +playerName+"; p.sendMessage("Jailed by "+playerName); } else { sendMessage("The name doesnt exist."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Try entering a name you want to jail.."); } } else if (absY >= 3230 && absY <= 3407) { sendMessage("You cannot teleport when your in jail!!!"); }
